description:
★ ★ ★ ★ ★  WAGmob: Over 350,000 paying customers from 175+ countries. 100% satisfaction is guaranteed. ★ ★ ★ ★ ★

WAGmob brings you a Simple 'n Easy on-the-go learning app for Robotics. The app helps you understand the basics in a nice and organized manner. Features include tutorials, quizzes, and more.

App is continuously updated based on your feedback.

App tools include search feature.

Includes following tutorials:

Robotics- Introduction,
History of Robots,
Types of Robots,
Why use Robots,
Where are Robots used,
What are Robots made of- I,
What are Robots made of- II,
Robot Drive Train Design- I,
Robot Drive Train Design- II,
Areas included in Robotics,
Advantages and Limitations of Robotics.
Includes following quizzes:

Quiz on Robotics,
Quiz on Anatomy of  Robots,
Quiz on Miscellaneous.


What is unique about WAGmob apps?

1) A companion app for on-the-go, bite-sized learning.

2) Offers value for money (a lifetime of free updates).

3) Over 350,000 paying customers from 175+ countries.


Our Vision: Provide simple ‘n easy apps for a lifetime of on-the-go learning.

Our Mission: A simple ‘n easy WAGmob app in every hand.
Please write to us Team@WAGmob.com. We would love to improve this app.
